DOC.brief_summary: Assessing 123 Iodine MIBG produced locally for safety while being used in clinical practice to help in patient management decisions.
DOC.brief_title: Study Of the Safety of Locally Manufactured 123I-metaiodobenzylguanidine(MIBG) in Routine Clinical Use
DOC.detailed_description: We will be assessing for adverse reactions of patients injected with locally manufactured 123 Iodine MIBG. With monitoring of blood pressure and heart rate following injection and any potential immediate side effects.
DOC.criteria: Patients with potential Adrenergic pathology Pregnant or breast feeding females Hypersensitivity to MIBG
